answers.answer: I really don't like saying this because if it were easy, we'd all do it right?  Truly, high protein-low carb, get weight to healthy level and exercise.  It would be wonderful if they could find a cure but it has changed and improved over the 17 yrs of my career and made diabetes more pt. friendly.  I am really impressed you still take oral medication.  Good for you!  I assume your A1C is good level.  Diabetes can have devistating consequences if not controlled and it is so silent and sneaky.  Take one day and one change at a time.  Start eating more healthy a couple of days a week and then work your way up, then exercise etc...  I wish you the best!
